column2: "Since you've always provided ingredients for a fair reward, we have a bit of a surplus in our galley's budget."
"Slightly under budget, mind you, just slightly!"
"Anyway, this time I want to ask you to get me some vegetables, rather than meat-- for the usual reward, of course."
"Oh, and I believe wizened wild weed only grows in Volcanic Caverns. At least, that's what I've heard."
"Hm... Maybe this request will be harder than usual. But you'll still do it, won't you, <%me>?"
